Name: Benchmark-sysbench-fileio-rkt
Details: Test fileio performance by caculating the i/o time

Containers.Cmd: chmod 757 /etc/resolv.conf ; echo 'nameserver 8.8.8.8' >> /etc/resolv.conf; apt-get update; apt-get install -y sysbench; sysbench --file-total-size=4096M --test=fileio prepare; sysbench --file-total-size=4096M  --file-test-mode=seqwr --test=fileio run; sysbench --file-total-size=4096M  --file-test-mode=seqrd --test=fileio run; sysbench --file-total-size=4096M  --file-test-mode=rndwr --test=fileio run; sysbench --file-total-size=4096M  --file-test-mode=rndrd --test=fileio run; sysbench --file-total-size=4096M --test=fileio cleanup; sysbench --file-total-size=8192M --test=fileio prepare; sysbench --file-total-size=8192M  --file-test-mode=seqwr --test=fileio run; sysbench --file-total-size=8192M  --file-test-mode=seqrd --test=fileio run; sysbench --file-total-size=8192M  --file-test-mode=rndwr --test=fileio run; sysbench --file-total-size=8192M  --file-test-mode=rndrd --test=fileio run; sysbench --file-total-size=8192M --test=fileio cleanup
